attributes.action: Tell us how long you believe it will be until the people take up arms against your undermining of democracy in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Every single day we hear about more communities being ridden roughshod over by our hubristic David Cameron's cronies in government.  It is only a matter of time before there is going to be a MASSIVE and VIOLENT uprising against the erosion of our society and in my view NOT BEFORE TIME.
